name: Walls of Stone
description: This pixelated game will 8-bit right into your favorites. This brain-workout will surely occupy you for long periods of time. This is MintStudios' 1st released game on the google play store. This game has clever concepts that will have you thinking! Avoid turret shots to stay alive. These turrets will put pressure on your puzzle-solving skills. Collect keys like you have never collected before! Get it on Google Play!
